TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it\'s located in the halls of Valhalla, and thus you had to be killed by battleaxe to the face first, it took you roughly 20 min. to bleed out.

I wish for Torres to start missing again.

Granted, but the ball misses and hits YOUR face.

I wish for pi.

Granted, you get three pies.

I wish the forces of Chaos would finally pour out of the Eye of Terror and consume the galaxy.

Granted, but you\'re the galaxy.

I wish Mince would acknowledge the current IeK meeting.

Granted, during the meeting I promise to build one hydrogen bomb for everyone attending and fire it at them.

I wish my Bigtrak was life-size.

Granted, but it\'s in my nation - and gets hit by your H-bomb.

I wish that you didn\'t destroy half of Kerbin, Mincey.

Granted, but kirby destroys it completely.

I wish for Hydrogen to be Helium ( )

Granted, but we all pass out and die because we need hydrogen.

I wish that I would have a Nerf riot shield gun.

Granted, but I always steal guns form others in Nerf wars...

I wish for

Granted, but I always steal guns form others in Nerf wars...

I wish for

Unfortunately

I wish someone would find the g-orbitals (hint: there are 9) around atoms.

Because only 118 elements are so.... elementary

:

Granted, but as a consequence the universe is destabilised in a local region, causing all of your atoms to fall apart.

I wish I could get Turkish Delight made properly

Granted, but as a consequence the universe is destabilised in a local region, causing all of your atoms to fall apart.

I wish I could get Turkish Delight made properly

Granted, but it still tastes bad :\'(

I wish Egosoft would release X-Rebirth already!

Granted, but they release it for an unknown operating system at 800 USD per copy.

I wish I had a flying car.

Granted, but they release it for an unknown operating system at 800 USD per copy.

I wish I had a flying car.

Granted, but it is haunted.

I wish Sanguinius didn\'t get killed by Horus.

Granted, but it is haunted.

I wish Sanguinius didn\'t get killed by Horus.

Granted, he is murdered by Anubis instead.

I wish I had a ryoukien.

I don\'t know the word, you get a cookie

I wish nothing

Granted, but we also think that means you want nothing in your life, so you pop out of existence.

I wish for unlimited game-making ability.

welcome to the programer tunnel!

I wish kerbol has not only a texture

Granted, but they make the model eat up Kerbin.

I wish for Pi.

You die 3.1415 times...

I wish for people to realize what my avatar means...

Granted, but then people would like it and it\'d become the new MLP.

I wish for Pi to the power of 3.

Granted but 3 is now the 3rd root of pi, so all people can oly count to 2.

I wish that I knew the whole Unicode caracter set from memory....

Grananted, but your barin is full now

I wish green is green

Grananted, but your barin is full now

I wish green is green

Granted... you turn into a Kerbal. You are green, and green stays green. have fun on your suicidal missions!

I wish for a pie in a cake in a pie in a cake in a pie in a cake.

Granted but it is a lie, oddly enough.

I wish for there to be a colony on the Mun that can survive the Munar night with Zoxygen without a million tanks of ZO2.
